titleStmt.title: A perseruatiue, or triacle, agaynst the poyson of Pelagius lately renued, ... by the furious secte of the Annabaptistes ... By Willyam Turner, Doctor of Physick.
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

titleStmt.title: A perseruatiue, or triacle, agaynst the poyson of Pelagius lately renued, ... by the furious secte of the Annabaptistes ... By Willyam Turner, Doctor of Physick.
titleStmt.author: Turner, William, d. 1568.

publicationStmt.date: dwellyng in Powles churchyarde, at the wytt horsse next to Powles scole. An. 1551. The 30 of Ianuarij.]

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name from STC.
Includes paragraphs from an attack on Turner by an unnamed Anabaptist, alternating with the former's answers.--NUC Pre-1956.
Some pages marked and stained; title page mutilated with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
